Name: DataBinding
Description: This example demonstrates how to use RadTransitionControl in a data binding scenario.

Name: Transition Without Bindings
Description:
This example demonstrates how to use RadTransitionControl between two UserControls (without bindings set to the RadTransitionControl)
for Silverlight and WPF.
KeyWords: Transition Without Bindings,  SlideAndZoomTransition, RadDocking, RadScheduleView
